General.Name: American Green Group Inc
General.Description: American Green Group, Inc. sells green foam-related products and equipment to install the foam. It markets equipment and green spray foam products under Insulsoy and Ecosafe labels. The company was formerly known as Regions Oil & Gas, Inc. and changed its name to American Green Group, Inc. in February 2008. American Green Group, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Hamden, Connecticut.
General.Address: 3000 Whitney Avenue, Hamden, CT, United States, 06518
